程序包 com.darly.dview.widget.xlistView

  • 接口概要 
    接口 说明
    XLinearLayout.IXLinearLayoutListener  
    XListView.IXListViewListener
    implements this interface to get refresh/load more item.
    XListView.OnXScrollListener
    you can listen ListView.OnScrollListener or this one. it will invoke onXScrolling when header/footer scroll back.
  • 类概要 
    类 说明
    XLinearLayout
    ListView、GridView和ScrollView统一上拉下拉刷新
    XListView
    An ListView support (a) Pull down to refresh, (b) Pull up to load more.
    XListViewFooter
    XListViewFooter.java
    XListViewHeader
    XListView's header
